description: This module invites students to reflect on Malay films, particularly the classics. Malay films are important documents of Malay social and cultural history. The main themes, ideas and values reflected in Malay films are analysed and understood against the background of their times. Through a reflection on Malay films, its audience and the social conditions inspiring them, the module hopes to gain further insights into the evolution and development of Malay society and culture.
title: Malay Film
prerequisite:
Cohort 2011 and before:
Completed 80MCs, including 28MCs in MS, with a minimum CAP of 3.50 or be on the Honours track.

Cohort 2012 onwards:
Completed 80MCs, including 28MCs in MS, with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track.
